body.p: The Publishing Execution page displays information about the status of deliverables with builds that are pending or in progress. You also have the ability to stop builds that are in progress from this page.

section.title: Execution Status Information
section.p: While a deliverable build is processing (or is in a pending state), the Publishing Execution page provides the following information:

ul.li: Type - The type of build. You can hover over the symbol in this column to see the type that the symbol represents.
Name - The name of the build.
Status - The current status of the build (Pending, Running, Cancelled, or Finished). You can hover over the symbol in this column to see what the status symbol means.
Queued - The amount of time the build spent in the queue.
Duration - The amount of time the build spent processing.
Actions - You can click the Stop button in this column to stop a particular build.
